description.desc1: Loads and saves texures. The modification of textures is only black and white. The main purpose is the use for mask in combination with Texture-Effect-Nodes.
description.desc2: The saved texture will be a PNG.

image file.descript: load image (TIFF. GIF, JPEG, PNG) and save mask

filewatch.descript: reloads texture automatically if file changes.

dimension.descript: default dimensions. used to create default mask.

planes.descript:
The loaded image is a black and white-texture. This has to be transformed into a ARGB-texture and the planes defines how the black/white values are set for a 4-channel ARGB texture. 
	<li>'mmmm' will set all channels 
		 to the bw-values. 
	<li>'mwww' will only set the Alpha-channel 
		 to the bw-value, while the 
		 RGB-channels will be set 
		 to white (1.0) 
	<li>'wmmm' will set the Alpha-channel 
		 to white and the RGB-channels 
		 to the bw-value.

edit.descript: sets the focus of the editor window to this node

render pass.descript: render pass. default is a manual render pass since the loaded texture needs only passed on once because of its static nature.

Notes.note1: After a modification of the texture with the editor, the file needs to be saved, otherwise the changes get lost.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
